I was paying out of my own pockets but since COVID hit, it’s been hard. 

Thank you
<NAME>

Refund request reason: Hello. I thought I cancelled my subscription earlier this month. Refund request reason: Hello! I cancelled my subscription  on August 2020 through my apple account. I do use Canva but I assumed I was using what is free and available to use. Thank you! 
<NAME>

<NAME> №: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Fraudulent activity! I cancelled my first month subscription in Google Play on Jan 17. However, you charged me for the second month without my consent! Fraud!

Refund request reason: Hi, I have no plans to use Canva this whole month and I was late to cancel my subscription before the recurring charge yesterday. Would you mind cancel and refund the money to me please? Thank you.

Refund request reason: I didn't know I was being charged for this - if you look at my account you'll see I haven't used this service for months and months.  Please refund me and cancel my subscription.  Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi. I didn't know my membership has renewed again. Please can I request refund for the last two months since I haven't even used Canva for a couple of months. I just dropped out of school and I really need these funds to buy food now. Could you also please delete my card info from your system? Please contact me at <EMAIL> The last 4 digits of my card are 6670.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I believe I cancelled my subscription in August - haven't been billed since then but was billed today. I just cancelled again to be sure, but would like to request a refund for this month as I won't be using the service. thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi! I did not know that my account was under some kind of subscription and it charged me $16.99 on February 2nd. Is there any chance I can get refund because I don’t even use Canva and won’t be using for an entire month that you guys charged me for. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel my subscription last month, and I thought I had so I was surprised to see this charge. When I got the email I cancelled my subscription immediately. I was hoping to get a refund on this invoice because I cancelled my subscription right away and I haven't used Canva for the past month and I'm not planning on using it this month at all.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this subscription on Dec. 28th, I would like to be refunded for this month please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I was using one month free to test it out and got billed today. I immediately cancelled my membership as I don't want benefits for this month but I am not getting a refund? Please refund me!!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I would like to please request a refund for about  5 months of canva. I have been trying to cancel premium membership for canva for the past few months as it was costing me a fortune, however I was unsuccessful with cancelling as it was unclear to me what I had to do to cancel. As there have been several issues with using these "premium" services such as; watermarks and not being able to access some of the 'canva pro' services (just to name a few) and also not using it for the past few months, so I would really appreciate it if I were to get a full refund on those months as it was not my intention to continue using canva. I have been charged several times from my debit card to your company without realising as was thinking that I may have cancelled it somehow, however that has not been the case. It hurts me and makes me very upset to see that a lot of my hard earned money on a low salary has been wasted on months worth of canva even though I have not been active on the app or website. It would really make my day and help me out a lot if I were to receive my full refund and get my money back on this. 

Thank you so much and I hope you will consider my request. 

Kind regards. 

P.S. I have selected one of the invoice no. options as I have a few of the options in my invoice history. Thanks again.

What do you need help with?: Hello I stopped my canva subscription 3-4 months ago and yet you guys are still charging me every month. Can you please resolve this and refund me the past few months!!!

the last charge invoice ID is <NUMBER>. 

I would like this fixed and refunded as I have not used your services for months and have canceled the subscription.

Describe the issue: Hi there, 
I signed up with you guys back in June to see if you platform would work with some projects I was working on. I tried it out and liked the idea of it, but was not happy with the interface for what I need it for. I kept the subscription anyway thinking that I would use it again, but after a couple of months passed I cancelled my subscription. Or so I thought. 
I was just compiling paperwork for my taxes and saw that I am still being charged every month. I dont mind being charged a couple months because I opted to stick around, but I would like to be refunded for the months I did not use it and thought my account was inactive. Please let me know what the next steps are. Thank You. 
-Caitlin

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello! I was opted out for the renewal i believe. Or I had tried through support last month to cancel this. Could I please end the pro subscription and get a refund for not using this month. I won’t be needing it at all. Thank you

Refund request reason: Hi, I did not realize I still had this subscription. I have not used it in many months. Please refund me. Thank you!

In that respect, could I please request for a refund. Please charge me the month I have used it but not till 2022 pls. My alternative email address is <EMAIL> should you need to contact me.

Hope you resolve our issue soon.

Aakash garg
